name: Rowlet
description: At a distance, it launches its sharp feathers while flying about. If the enemy gets too close, Rowlet switches tactics and delivers vicious kicks.

abilities.name: Sky Circus
abilities.effect: If you played Bird Keeper from your hand during this turn, ignore all Energy in this Pokémon’s attack costs.

attacks.name: Wind Shard
attacks.effect: This attack does 60 damage to 1 of your opponent’s Benched Pokémon. (Don’t apply Weakness and Resistance for Benched Pokémon.)
